As its name suggests, the group includes city mayors concerned with

The group hired Republican pollster Frank Luntz. His organization, Luntz

The reality is that background checks are required in sales by federally
licensed gun dealers, but not for those by private sellers.
The White House wants to require criminal background checks for all gun
sales. The National Rifle Association, which supports the current
background check requirement, has suggested that an expansion of the law
might be a step toward gun confiscation.
